Vulois

Vulois looked at Child and laughed.

"No, it's good! You've discovered your Convix! It's a voice in your 
head that explains things to you. This is going to make your training 
alot easier! Now come help me remove all these computer boards."

______________________________________________________________________
Brix/Fliq

Fliq enters the bridge where Brix is, looking back to see if Ramulus 
was still following him. Than he hears Brix singing some strange song.

"Down in the west Texas Town of El Paso, I fell in love with a 
Mexican Girl!"

"What are you singing?!?"

"Oh, Fliq, it's you. Nothin', just an old song I found from Earth 
records. Come on, help me with this."

They go to work removing the computer boards.

______________________________________________________________________
Starscream

Starscream leaves the room angry. He must follow orders, but he does 
realize that he will get revenge on all. He pulls out his blaster and 
fires it against the wall. It makes a huge indent. Starscream just 
smiles and laughs, knowing soom it will be a Maximal taking that shot.

______________________________________________________________________
Noble/Savage

Noble arrives at The Ark. He can smell the vile bots that live there. 
With every step he gets angrier, until he finaly he mutates into the 
dragon Savage! He takes off into the sky, and fires huge fireballs 
down onto the hull of The Ark.
